channel.title: Categories on Martina Martonsky
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Martina Martonsky

item.title: Anticorpǝ festival
item.description: Series created for ANTICORPǝ festival, organized by ConsultoriaFAM e Microclinica Fatih in Torino – focused on transfeminist and community health.

item.title: article ''Rape Culture in Italy: the Facts''
item.description: Series of illustrations for the article “la cultura dello stupro in Italia: i dati alla mano” (tr. “Rape Culture in Italy: the Facts"), written by Anna Stanchi and edited by EqualiLab Italia, April 2021.

item.title: CHEAP ''RECLAIM''
item.description: Selected artist at the CHEAP call for artists 2020. The selected posters were installed in the streets of Bologna. CHEAP is a project focused on street poster art, founded in Bologna in 2013. The theme of this call: reclaiming a right that has been denied to us.

item.title: CHEAP “ON FIRE”
item.description: Selected artist at the CHEAP call for artists 2022. CHEAP is a project focused on street poster art, founded in Bologna in 2013. The theme of this call: fire. The selected posters were installed in the streets of Bologna, as sparks to set the city on fire.

item.title: Contest ''Collaging a Gender-Equal Future''
item.description: “Sisterhood” has been selected as one of the three winners of the contest “Collaging a Gender-Equal Future: Tailoring the Transformations of the Euro-Mediterranean Space”, launched by the European Institute of the Mediterranean (IEMed) together with Euro-Mediterranean Women’s Foundation (FFEM) as part of the Voix de femmes project, led by Forum de Femmes Mediterranée.

item.title: CREVADURIS
item.description: Crevaduris is a project founded in Udine in 2021 with the aim of raising awareness on the issues of pain and rebirth. During the summer of 2021 Crevaduris organized an art exhibition. For this occasion, I created the series “Loving My Body” which addresses the issue of insecurities and fragility related to one’s own body, fostered by a society that regularly tells us how we are supposed to be.

item.title: Logo Libreria Itinerante
item.description: Logo created for the bookshop run by Ippoasi, a sanctuary for so-called farmed animals, based near Pisa, Italy.

item.title: MEGAZINNE mag
item.description: With the mini-graphic novel The Warriors of the Planet N-pp-l I responded to the Call for contribution launched by Megazinne magazine, a magazine about boobs in pop-culture. The theme: boobs and Sci-fi.

item.title: MEKKA records
item.description: Illustrations and animated graphics created for the Electricity Sessions x Mekka Records’ music videos. Mekka Records is an independent record label in Athens, Greece. Link to the music videos: Teleferik - Luna Filthy - Part Of The Process Youth Valley - Full Performance

item.title: SESSFEM TORINO 2021
item.description: SessFem is a self-organized workshop, free and open to everyone, an experience of exploration, collective learning, a place to reappropriate and redefine the personal body, pleasure, language and education. This series of drawings has been created for the edition of SessFem Torino 2021.

item.title: SISTER mag
item.description: Sister Magazine is an independent zine from the UK. Contribution for the Self Issue of 2022.

item.title: TAMPEP
item.description: Tampep Onlus is a non-profit organization based in Torino. It supports the rights of vulnerable and socially discriminated people, promoting actions and interventions in consideration of their choices and dignity. The illustrations were created for printed postcards and bags, on the occasion of the organization’s 20th anniversary.
